con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://eos-asb-srv-s1.global.finods.com/asbservices/api/v1"> <resource path="/fraud"> <resource path="/payment"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/payment/{transaction-id}"> <param name="transaction-id" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/1.0"> <resource path="/configuration"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/status"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="type" style="query" default="shallow" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
